jobPublication.pageDescription: In this exciting role you manage and optimize feed-based campaigns and help us to manage and develop partner relationships.
jobPublication.introduction:
Are you passionate about creating, managing and optimizing feed-based campaigns and are you driven by performance?

Join our growing Marketing team! We are looking for a talented Digital Campaigns & Performance Manager to help us also managing and further develop partner relationships.
jobPublication.tasks:
• You create, manage and optimize feed-based campaigns, based on CPC/CPConv metrics
  • You distribute campaigns promoting individual job ads on our digital ecosystem of alliances/partners and other 3rd party & social media platforms
  • You successfully manage existing partner relationships and always be on the look-out to extend our digital ecosystem with new partners (both B2C as B2B)
  • You work closely together with the wider (digital) marketing- , product-, IT- and Sales-teams
  • You generate Weekly, Monthly and Quarterly performance reports and actively discuss these internally and with the partners
jobPublication.profile:
• Bachelor Degree in Marketing or similar
  • 3+ years experience in digital Marketing, experience managing external (media) partners is a plus
  • Hands-on experience managing CPC/CPConv campaigns in one or more paid media channels: SEA, Display, Affiliate or Social Advertising
  • A people person who builds lasting relationships and thrives in a fast-paced, high-growth collaborative environment
  • Commercially driven with an eye for new opportunities and strong negotiation skills
  • Profound presentation and project management skills
  • Excellent communication skills in German, combined with good French & English skills
jobPublication.weOffer:
• Motivated and dedicated teams
  • A unique corporate culture with helpful and open environment
  • A hybrid working model with flexible working hours and the possibility to work remotely
  • Attractive working conditions & benefits
  • Modern offices in the city of Zurich

contact.body:
Your Tasks

  • You create, manage and optimize feed-based campaigns, based on CPC/CPConv metrics
  • You distribute campaigns promoting individual job ads on our digital ecosystem of alliances/partners and other 3rd party & social media platforms
  • You successfully manage existing partner relationships and always be on the look-out to extend our digital ecosystem with new partners (both B2C as B2B)
  • You work closely together with the wider (digital) marketing- , product-, IT- and Sales-teams
  • You generate Weekly, Monthly and Quarterly performance reports and actively discuss these internally and with the partners

Your skills

  • Bachelor Degree in Marketing or similar
  • 3+ years experience in digital Marketing, experience managing external (media) partners is a plus
  • Hands-on experience managing CPC/CPConv campaigns in one or more paid media channels: SEA, Display, Affiliate or Social Advertising
  • A people person who builds lasting relationships and thrives in a fast-paced, high-growth collaborative environment
  • Commercially driven with an eye for new opportunities and strong negotiation skills
  • Profound presentation and project management skills
  • Excellent communication skills in German, combined with good French & English skills

Our offer

  • Motivated and dedicated teams
  • A unique corporate culture with helpful and open environment
  • A hybrid working model with flexible working hours and the possibility to work remotely
  • Attractive working conditions & benefits
  • Modern offices in the city of Zurich

Your Contact Person

 

Claudine
Recruiter

Phone: +41 445607018

 
By the way: We don't care about your skin colour, your gender identity or your beliefs... Come as your are, you are just good.

introduction.body:
You've surely heard of jobs.ch. This is just one of the many brands owned by JobCloud. We are the leading player in Switzerland’s online job market and want to make job search and recruitment as easy as possible. Love what you do – we make employment happen!
 

Are you passionate about creating, managing and optimizing feed-based campaigns and are you driven by performance?

Join our growing Marketing team! We are looking for a talented Digital Campaigns & Performance Manager to help us also managing and further develop partner relationships.

benefit.name: Lunch
benefit.description: Our fridge is always full of tasty dishes - Home Delivery also possible!

benefit.name: Mobile Office
benefit.description: Work from the office, from home, or both

benefit.name: Maternity and paternity leave
benefit.description: Moms: 16 weeks. Dads: 3 weeks. Fully paid. Enjoy!

benefit.name: Public transport discounts
benefit.description: Up to 650.- for public transport and a Half-Fare Card for free!

benefit.name: Private Insurance
benefit.description: With us you are privately insured in case of accident!

benefit.name: Language classes
benefit.description: For free! Generally English, German and French classes, but others are also available

benefit.name: Pension scheme
benefit.description: Occupational pension: we cover 60% of the contributions

benefit.name: Further training
benefit.description: We cover 50% of the costs if job relevant :)

formFieldChoice.answer: Referral bonus after joining & after 3 months of employment

company.name: JobCloud AG
company.description1: You've surely heard of jobs.ch. This is just one of the many brands owned by JobCloud. We are the leading player in Switzerland’s online job market and want to make job search and recruitment as easy as possible. Love what you do – we make employment happen!

jobPublication.pageDescription: As a Digital Marketing Manager you manage paid search & display performance marketing campaign and processes with an eye for setting goals and achieving them!
jobPublication.introduction:
• Are you a seasoned digital marketing ninja tired of working on boring and impactless projects?
  • Do you want to work in a company with real values and an environment where you can make an impact on people's lives?
  • Have you already managed digital marketing paid ads budgets above 6 digits?
  • Do you love digging into data and problem solving your way to reach campaigns positive ROI?

If you answered yes to the questions above, then we should talk!
jobPublication.tasks:
• You manage paid search & display performance marketing campaign and processes with an eye for setting goals and achieving them
  • You act as an integral part of the performance marketing team to execute data-driven campaigns ensuring campaign delivery, performance and goals being fulfilled to the highest standard
  • You identify latest competitive trends and apply them to your channels driven by innovation and automation
  • You strategize and manage Google Ads, Google Display and Criteo to build ROAS driven campaigns
  • You leverage data dashboards, cross-channel attribution and analytics platform to identify bottlenecks and opportunities
  • You own your budget, accountable for search & display performance and growth by scaling a strong traffic engine even further attracting new converting audiences while driving high ROAS efficiency
  • You apply creative solution to improve your campaigns and suggest out-of-the-box initiatives to grow, working together with the Brand team, Design team, Content team and all the performance channel experts in the marketing department
jobPublication.profile:
• 4+ years managing hands on paid search performance driven ads campaigns for large scale websites on Google Ads, Microsoft Bing and Apple Search Ads
  • 4+ years managing hands on display performance driven ads campaigns for large scale websites on Google Display Ads and Criteo
  • 2+ years managing 7 digits per year ad budgets as well as 2+ years managing dynamic recommendation engine driven remarketing campaigns on complex audience ecosystem (lookalikes, exclusions, overlap, etc.)
  • Excellent knowledge in we analytics and tracking leading you to be results-driven by mastering ROAS calculations and cross-channel impact
  • Hands on / get things done owner mindset and track record
  • Self-driven, innovative thinker, entrepreneurial and excellent agile problem solver - You enjoy coming up and implementing creative solutions and have the track record of clever ideas to prove it
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills in English
jobPublication.weOffer:
• The freedom to implement your own ideas
  • Motivated, dedicated and fun teams
  • Home office possibilities
  • Flexible working hours
  • Attractive working conditions & benefits
  • A unique corporate culture
  • A helpful and open environment
  • The most modern offices in the city of Zurich

contact.body:
Your Tasks

  • You manage paid search & display performance marketing campaign and processes with an eye for setting goals and achieving them
  • You act as an integral part of the performance marketing team to execute data-driven campaigns ensuring campaign delivery, performance and goals being fulfilled to the highest standard
  • You identify latest competitive trends and apply them to your channels driven by innovation and automation
  • You strategize and manage Google Ads, Google Display and Criteo to build ROAS driven campaigns
  • You leverage data dashboards, cross-channel attribution and analytics platform to identify bottlenecks and opportunities
  • You own your budget, accountable for search & display performance and growth by scaling a strong traffic engine even further attracting new converting audiences while driving high ROAS efficiency
  • You apply creative solution to improve your campaigns and suggest out-of-the-box initiatives to grow, working together with the Brand team, Design team, Content team and all the performance channel experts in the marketing department

Your skills

  • 4+ years managing hands on paid search performance driven ads campaigns for large scale websites on Google Ads, Microsoft Bing and Apple Search Ads
  • 4+ years managing hands on display performance driven ads campaigns for large scale websites on Google Display Ads and Criteo
  • 2+ years managing 7 digits per year ad budgets as well as 2+ years managing dynamic recommendation engine driven remarketing campaigns on complex audience ecosystem (lookalikes, exclusions, overlap, etc.)
  • Excellent knowledge in we analytics and tracking leading you to be results-driven by mastering ROAS calculations and cross-channel impact
  • Hands on / get things done owner mindset and track record
  • Self-driven, innovative thinker, entrepreneurial and excellent agile problem solver - You enjoy coming up and implementing creative solutions and have the track record of clever ideas to prove it
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills in English

Our offer

  • The freedom to implement your own ideas
  • Motivated, dedicated and fun teams
  • Home office possibilities
  • Flexible working hours
  • Attractive working conditions & benefits
  • A unique corporate culture
  • A helpful and open environment
  • The most modern offices in the city of Zurich

Your Contact Person

 

Claudine
Recruiter

Phone: +41 445607018

 
By the way: We don't care about your skin colour, your gender identity or your beliefs... Come as your are, you are just good.

company.name: JobCloud AG
company.description1: You've surely heard of jobs.ch. This is just one of the many brands owned by JobCloud. We are the leading player in Switzerland’s online job market and want to make job search and recruitment as easy as possible. Love what you do – we make employment happen!

jobPublication.pageDescription: As a Head of Product at JobCloud, you have the chance to make a difference for job seekers and employers. Help us to shape the future of our products and make JobCloud stand out in a competitive market!
jobPublication.introduction: As a Head of Product at JobCloud, you have the chance to make a difference for job seekers and employers. Help us to shape the future of our products and make JobCloud stand out in a competitive market!
jobPublication.tasks:
• Defining the product vision and road map of our programmatic and pay-per-performance job ad products in line with JobCloud's company strategy
  • Shaping how we move towards pay-per-performance products in the Swiss market in the long run
  • Collaborating closely in a cross functional team with Sales, Marketing, UX, Engineering and Data
  • Assessing product success in quantitative and qualitative analyses
  • Taking fact-based decisions accordingly
  • Leading the Product team in Programmatic consisting of one Senior Product Manager
  • Contributing to the Product Management and UX community at JobCloud
jobPublication.profile:
• Several years of experience in Product Management roles covering different digital products
  • At least 1 year of experience in people management
  • Experience in programmatic advertising, within a online media and/or recruitment is an advantage
  • Solution-oriented and strong analytical thinking skills combined with a desire to make fact-based decisions
  • Experience of operating in an agile work environment
  • Perseverance and patience to push a product with a lot of potential
  • A motivated self-starter who enjoys a challenge of identifying and driving success where the path is unclear
  • Fluent in English, German and French is a plus
jobPublication.weOffer:
• Interesting products, projects and challenges
  • Unique company culture with open environment
  • An open mind for your ideas and opinion
  • Dynamic working environment with a lot of freedom
  • A hybrid working model with flexible working hours and the possibility to work remotely
  • Modern offices in Zurich and Geneva

contact.body:
Your Tasks

  • Defining the product vision and road map of our programmatic and pay-per-performance job ad products in line with JobCloud's company strategy
  • Shaping how we move towards pay-per-performance products in the Swiss market in the long run
  • Collaborating closely in a cross functional team with Sales, Marketing, UX, Engineering and Data
  • Assessing product success in quantitative and qualitative analyses
  • Taking fact-based decisions accordingly
  • Leading the Product team in Programmatic consisting of one Senior Product Manager
  • Contributing to the Product Management and UX community at JobCloud

Your skills

  • Several years of experience in Product Management roles covering different digital products
  • At least 1 year of experience in people management
  • Experience in programmatic advertising, within a online media and/or recruitment is an advantage
  • Solution-oriented and strong analytical thinking skills combined with a desire to make fact-based decisions
  • Experience of operating in an agile work environment
  • Perseverance and patience to push a product with a lot of potential
  • A motivated self-starter who enjoys a challenge of identifying and driving success where the path is unclear
  • Fluent in English, German and French is a plus

Our offer

  • Interesting products, projects and challenges
  • Unique company culture with open environment
  • An open mind for your ideas and opinion
  • Dynamic working environment with a lot of freedom
  • A hybrid working model with flexible working hours and the possibility to work remotely
  • Modern offices in Zurich and Geneva

Your Contact Person

 

Marina
Senior Recruiter

Phone: +41 79 349 32 51

 
By the way: We don't care about your skin colour, your gender identity or your beliefs... Come as your are, you are just good.

company.name: JobCloud AG
company.description1: You've surely heard of jobs.ch. This is just one of the many brands owned by JobCloud. We are the leading player in Switzerland’s online job market and want to make job search and recruitment as easy as possible. Love what you do – we make employment happen!

jobPublication.pageDescription: Increasing sales efficiency and competitiveness by designing and implementing a digital sales process within our existing CRM system in Zurich full time and working on Sales Automation.
jobPublication.introduction:
Do you believe Sales can anticipate customer's needs, and serve them the right solution even before they manage to figure it out? Do you believe AI and can help improve customer service? Are you eager to improve the impact of data and analytics on the sales activity?

If you do and if you have already designed and managed the deployment of sales automation, then we should talk!
jobPublication.tasks:
• Report to the Head of Sales Operation and participate in team related project and processes (Salesforce environment)
  • Analyze our Sales and Service processes and identify the best opportunities for further digitalization, with focus on small and medium businesses (SMB) and e-Commerce areas
  • Imagine and design improved digital Sales and Service processes in order to boost effectiveness - closely cooperating with our product department
  • Collaborate with IT and product engineers for deploying identified improvements of the new designed digital processes
  • Manage preproduction testing, quality control and ongoing monitoring of the deployed process 
  • Cooperate with the Lead Sales Operation for project managing CRM digitalization, ensuring data and reportings integrity and effective communication with the stake holders
jobPublication.profile:
• Preferably a Bachelor's degree in Science or Economy 
  • Several years of experience in the online B2B environment (Sales Operations, Sales or Marketing)
  • Experienced in cross-functional project management of sales process automatization (preferably in small or medium B2B businesses)
  • Fluent in German and English, French is a plus
  • Familiar with Salesforce and Marketing Cloud
  • Solution-oriented & analytical thinking skills combined with an entrepreneurial mindset 
  • High social competence and leadership potential
jobPublication.weOffer:
• An exciting and challenging long-term development opportunity in a new created role. We invest in your talent!
  • More than usual benefits
  • Modern working environment with a mobile office concept: work (almost) wherever you want
  • Motivated, dedicated and cross functional working teams, who love what they do
  • The freedom to implement your own ideas
  • A unique corporate culture
  • A helpful and open environment

contact.body:
Your Tasks

  • Report to the Head of Sales Operation and participate in team related project and processes (Salesforce environment)
  • Analyze our Sales and Service processes and identify the best opportunities for further digitalization, with focus on small and medium businesses (SMB) and e-Commerce areas
  • Imagine and design improved digital Sales and Service processes in order to boost effectiveness - closely cooperating with our product department
  • Collaborate with IT and product engineers for deploying identified improvements of the new designed digital processes
  • Manage preproduction testing, quality control and ongoing monitoring of the deployed process 
  • Cooperate with the Lead Sales Operation for project managing CRM digitalization, ensuring data and reportings integrity and effective communication with the stake holders

Your skills

  • Preferably a Bachelor's degree in Science or Economy 
  • Several years of experience in the online B2B environment (Sales Operations, Sales or Marketing)
  • Experienced in cross-functional project management of sales process automatization (preferably in small or medium B2B businesses)
  • Fluent in German and English, French is a plus
  • Familiar with Salesforce and Marketing Cloud
  • Solution-oriented & analytical thinking skills combined with an entrepreneurial mindset 
  • High social competence and leadership potential 

Our offer

  • An exciting and challenging long-term development opportunity in a new created role. We invest in your talent!
  • More than usual benefits
  • Modern working environment with a mobile office concept: work (almost) wherever you want
  • Motivated, dedicated and cross functional working teams, who love what they do
  • The freedom to implement your own ideas
  • A unique corporate culture
  • A helpful and open environment

Your Contact Person

 

Marina
Senior Recruiter

Phone: +41 79 349 32 51

 
By the way: We don't care about your skin colour, your gender identity or your beliefs... Come as your are, you are just good.

company.name: JobCloud AG
company.description1: You've surely heard of jobs.ch. This is just one of the many brands owned by JobCloud. We are the leading player in Switzerland’s online job market and want to make job search and recruitment as easy as possible. Love what you do – we make employment happen!

jobPublication.pageDescription: customer segmentation, value-based pricing, lifecycle analytics, lead scoring and many more. Come and join our great team of data engineers, data analysts, and data scientists to work on some of the most intriguing datasets out there!
jobPublication.introduction:
Do you want to unlock the power of data to help recruiters (B2B customers) find suited candidates and make employment happen?

We are looking for a Senior Business Analyst m/f/d to look into recruiters' behavior and work on such diverse topics as customer segmentation, value-based pricing, lifecycle analytics, lead scoring and many more. Come and join our great team of data engineers, data analysts, and data scientists to work on some of the most intriguing datasets out there!
jobPublication.tasks:
• Business understanding and impact: Proactively engage in constant dialogue with the business side (product, marketing, finance, sales) to solidly understand and impact their roadmaps and priorities
  • Deep dive analyses: Perform analytical deep dives for strategic business questions: independently and self-sufficiently identify relevant data sources, clean and combine the data if necessary, and thoroughly and creatively analyze the data using whatever tool set necessary (visualizations, data mining, clustering, predictive models, etc.)
  • Be the driving force for change: Lead data use cases from thought to finish and harness their full business value.
  • Identify new business opportunities by combining external with internal datasets to determine market trends and potential
  • Identify potential for efficiency gains such as digital process automation, or price differentiation by customer segments
  • Quick-response analyses for occasional urgent ad-hoc questions
jobPublication.profile:
• Degree in computer science, statistics/mathematics, engineering or equivalent
  • At least 5 years' experience in a comparable role (digital environment preferred)
  • Proficient in SQL and Python/R
  • Proven DWH/BI skills (AWS ecosystem, Tableau preferred)
  • Fluent in English, German and French is a plus
  • Interested in understanding the business and driving its performance
  • Able to work independently in a cross-functional environment
  • A highly curious and creative thinker with excellent analytic capabilities and pragmatic judgment
  • Strong hands-on mentality, customer focus and ability to build strong collaborations
jobPublication.weOffer:
• Dynamic digital environment with abundant data to be explored
  • A company reinventing itself to sustain its no. 1 position in the market
  • A young, dynamic and integrated team on a mission to turn data into value
  • Swift decision taking and full support of senior management
  • We believe in agile methods and testing, failing, and iterating to reach our goals
  • Impactful work in building up our data universe
  • Collaboration with universities and public institutions to gain a deep understanding of the Swiss labor market
  • Modern working environment with a mobile office concept: work (almost) wherever you want

contact.body:
Your Tasks

  • Business understanding and impact: Proactively engage in constant dialogue with the business side (product, marketing, finance, sales) to solidly understand and impact their roadmaps and priorities
  • Deep dive analyses: Perform analytical deep dives for strategic business questions: independently and self-sufficiently identify relevant data sources, clean and combine the data if necessary, and thoroughly and creatively analyze the data using whatever tool set necessary (visualizations, data mining, clustering, predictive models, etc.)
  • Be the driving force for change: Lead data use cases from thought to finish and harness their full business value.
  • Identify new business opportunities by combining external with internal datasets to determine market trends and potential
  • Identify potential for efficiency gains such as digital process automation, or price differentiation by customer segments
  • Quick-response analyses for occasional urgent ad-hoc questions

Your skills

  • Degree in computer science, statistics/mathematics, engineering or equivalent
  • At least 5 years' experience in a comparable role (digital environment preferred)
  • Proficient in SQL and Python/R
  • Proven DWH/BI skills (AWS ecosystem, Tableau preferred)
  • Fluent in English, German and French is a plus
  • Interested in understanding the business and driving its performance
  • Able to work independently in a cross-functional environment
  • A highly curious and creative thinker with excellent analytic capabilities and pragmatic judgment
  • Strong hands-on mentality, customer focus and ability to build strong collaborations

Our offer

  • Dynamic digital environment with abundant data to be explored
  • A company reinventing itself to sustain its no. 1 position in the market
  • A young, dynamic and integrated team on a mission to turn data into value
  • Swift decision taking and full support of senior management
  • We believe in agile methods and testing, failing, and iterating to reach our goals
  • Impactful work in building up our data universe
  • Collaboration with universities and public institutions to gain a deep understanding of the Swiss labor market
  • Modern working environment with a mobile office concept: work (almost) wherever you want

Your Contact Person

 

Marina
Senior Recruiter

Phone: +41 79 349 32 51

 
By the way: We don't care about your skin colour, your gender identity or your beliefs... Come as your are, you are just good.

company.name: JobCloud AG
company.description1: You've surely heard of jobs.ch. This is just one of the many brands owned by JobCloud. We are the leading player in Switzerland’s online job market and want to make job search and recruitment as easy as possible. Love what you do – we make employment happen!

jobPublication.pageDescription: We are looking for a Senior Graphic & Multi-Media Designer for our great Marketing Team!
jobPublication.introduction: We are looking for a Senior Graphic & Multi-Media Designer for our Marketing Team who helps us ensuring the consistency of our CI/CD and work on Graphic & Multi-Media design for our Marketing efforts.
jobPublication.tasks:
• You ensure all marketing communications across various channels and departments remain graphically & CI/CD consistent
  • You create, own and refine all Graphic & Multi-media design for our Marketing efforts, across channel and target groups
  • You are a primary 'Creative Design' sparring partner for the rest of Marketing when it comes to achieving our common goals
  • You manage a network of external designers to allow agility, flexibility and speed when it comes to delivering high quality designs
  • You will partner with copywriters, marketing managers, other (UX) designers and external agencies to ensure superior quality and consistency in all aspects of campaign execution
jobPublication.profile:
• Bachelor of Arts preferably in visual design and/or a strong online design portfolio featuring talents and relevant work experience
  • At least 5+ years experience in a similar position or related area
  • Exceptional portfolio reflecting experience in digital design, print design, and branding
  • Understanding of web design and UI/UX
  • Mastery of Adobe Creative Suite Programs, especially InDesign, Illustrator, and Photoshop
  • A passion for experimentation through testing
  • Fluency in English, German is a plus
jobPublication.weOffer:
• The freedom to implement your own ideas
  • Motivated, dedicated and fun teams
  • Home office possibilities
  • Flexible working hours
  • Attractive working conditions & benefits
  • A unique corporate culture
  • A helpful and open environment
  • The most modern offices in the city of Zurich

contact.body:
Your Tasks

  • You ensure all marketing communications across various channels and departments remain graphically & CI/CD consistent
  • You create, own and refine all Graphic & Multi-media design for our Marketing efforts, across channel and target groups
  • You are a primary 'Creative Design' sparring partner for the rest of Marketing when it comes to achieving our common goals
  • You manage a network of external designers to allow agility, flexibility and speed when it comes to delivering high quality designs
  • You will partner with copywriters, marketing managers, other (UX) designers and external agencies to ensure superior quality and consistency in all aspects of campaign execution

Your skills

  • Bachelor of Arts preferably in visual design and/or a strong online design portfolio featuring talents and relevant work experience
  • At least 5+ years experience in a similar position or related area
  • Exceptional portfolio reflecting experience in digital design, print design, and branding
  • Understanding of web design and UI/UX
  • Mastery of Adobe Creative Suite Programs, especially InDesign, Illustrator, and Photoshop
  • A passion for experimentation through testing
  • Fluency in English, German is a plus

Our offer

  • The freedom to implement your own ideas
  • Motivated, dedicated and fun teams
  • Home office possibilities
  • Flexible working hours
  • Attractive working conditions & benefits
  • A unique corporate culture
  • A helpful and open environment
  • The most modern offices in the city of Zurich

Your Contact Person

 

Claudine
Recruiter

Phone: +41 445607018

 
By the way: We don't care about your skin colour, your gender identity or your beliefs... Come as your are, you are just good.

introduction.body:
You've surely heard of jobs.ch. This is just one of the many brands owned by JobCloud. We are the leading player in Switzerland’s online job market and want to make job search and recruitment as easy as possible. Love what you do – we make employment happen!
 

We are looking for a Senior Graphic & Multi-Media Designer for our Marketing Team who helps us ensuring the consistency of our CI/CD and work on Graphic & Multi-Media design for our Marketing efforts.

benefit.name: Mobile Office
benefit.description: Work from the office, from home, or both

benefit.name: Lunch
benefit.description: Our fridge is always full of tasty dishes - Home Delivery also possible!

benefit.name: Further training
benefit.description: We cover 50% of the costs if job relevant :)

benefit.name: Private Insurance
benefit.description: With us you are privately insured in case of accident!

benefit.name: Language classes
benefit.description: For free! Generally English, German and French classes, but others are also available

benefit.name: Public transport discounts
benefit.description: Up to 650.- for public transport and a Half-Fare Card for free!

benefit.name: Maternity and paternity leave
benefit.description: Moms: 16 weeks. Dads: 3 weeks. Fully paid. Enjoy!

benefit.name: Pension scheme
benefit.description: Occupational pension: we cover 60% of the contributions

formFieldChoice.answer: Referral bonus after joining & after 3 months of employment

company.name: JobCloud AG
company.description1: You've surely heard of jobs.ch. This is just one of the many brands owned by JobCloud. We are the leading player in Switzerland’s online job market and want to make job search and recruitment as easy as possible. Love what you do – we make employment happen!

jobPublication.position: Senior Machine Learning Engineer Spotted f/m/d
jobPublication.pageTitle: Senior Machine Learning Engineer Spotted m/f/d
jobPublication.pageDescription: Conception, design and implementation of mission-critical ML & AI solutions (analysis, architecture, design, implementation & deployment of end-to-end systems)
jobPublication.introduction: Do you want to work in a team dedicated to delivering applied innovation in record speeds? Do you want to develop deep learning technologies that support users in publishing better content, deliver more personalized user experiences and streamline matching and search systems? Are you excited about the opportunity to have a tangible impact on an entire working population, both job seekers and employers alike?
jobPublication.tasks:
• Conception, design and implementation of mission-critical ML & AI solutions (analysis, architecture, design, implementation & deployment of end-to-end systems)
  • Design and implementation of data acquisition, ingestion, validation, transformation, augmentation and visualization pipelines
  • Investigating new approaches and evaluating new technologies and tools
jobPublication.profile:
• You have a Master / PhD in Computer Science, Data Science or equivalent work experience
  • You have practical experience in machine learning technologies related to NLP for tasks such as Embeddings, Named Entity Recognition, Classification, Taxonomies Construction, Sentiment Analysis, Text Similarity, ETL, and Predictive Modelling
  • You possess hands-on experience with ML frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, Gorgonia etc.
  • You are familiar with general purpose programming languages like Golang, Java, C / C++ or Python
  • You are an autodidact with heuristic practice
  • You speak English, basic knowledge of German and/or French (B1) are welcome
jobPublication.weOffer:
• Collaboration in a small interdisciplinary team of experts completely independent in a startup environment, with the mission to deliver 10X impact on our business through technology and product innovation
  • A friendly team of bikers, gamers and travelers who come to work every day because they love what they do
  • If you are the right teammate we are happy to meet your needs

contact.body:
Your Tasks

  • Conception, design and implementation of mission-critical ML & AI solutions (analysis, architecture, design, implementation & deployment of end-to-end systems)
  • Design and implementation of data acquisition, ingestion, validation, transformation, augmentation and visualization pipelines
  • Investigating new approaches and evaluating new technologies and tools

Your skills

  • You have a Master / PhD in Computer Science, Data Science or equivalent work experience
  • You have practical experience in machine learning technologies related to NLP for tasks such as Embeddings, Named Entity Recognition, Classification, Taxonomies Construction, Sentiment Analysis, Text Similarity, ETL, and Predictive Modelling
  • You possess hands-on experience with ML frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, Gorgonia etc.
  • You are familiar with general purpose programming languages like Golang, Java, C / C++ or Python
  • You are an autodidact with heuristic practice
  • You speak English, basic knowledge of German and/or French (B1) are welcome

Our offer

  • Collaboration in a small interdisciplinary team of experts completely independent in a startup environment, with the mission to deliver 10X impact on our business through technology and product innovation
  • A friendly team of bikers, gamers and travelers who come to work every day because they love what they do
  • If you are the right teammate we are happy to meet your needs

Your Contact Person

 

Claudine
Teamlead Digital Recruiting

Phone: +41 44 560 70 58

 
By the way: We don't care about your skin colour, your gender identity or your beliefs... Come as your are, you are just good.

company.name: Spotted
company.description1: Spotted by Jobs.ch is the sourcing & recruiting partner for the right talents. Thanks to our technology, we optimize job ads for search engines and job portals. With artificial intelligence, we find the right people among millions of talents.
